376f3b37-3917-4754-b3de-f06d713a5820.message: Hello Jane, I wanted to update you regarding my mental health diagnosis. I have been diagnosed with major depressive disorder since February 2023 and generalized anxiety disorder since December 2022. Recently, my assessment indicated that my depression symptoms have moderately worsened. Please let me know if you need any further information or if there's anything specific you advise going forward.
